feed.title: Koel Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: artwork download logic by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1986

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.8.0...v7.8.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: incorrect identification of successful scans by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1987
  • fix: artist/album info tab missing by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1988
  • chore(build): ignore changes in docs/ for most GitHub Actions flows by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1989
  • fix: local deletion of song files by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1991
  • feat: make dispatched jobs work in an async context by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1992
  • fix: use null broadcaster if no Pusher available by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1993
  • chore: tweak thumbnail stack generation logic by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1994
  • fix: restore playlist songs reordering functionality by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1995
  • chore: make album/artist side sheet display full info by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/1998
  • feat: denormalize artist and album names to improve performance by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2001
  • refactor: use enum for playable moving placement by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2002
  • refactor: use job instead of event for song folder extraction by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2003
  • fix: mime type and other DB migration issues by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2004

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.8.1...v7.9.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: make artist/album screen tabs URLs by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2007
  • feat: show Up Next for full screen by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2009
  • fix: upload user avatar by @phanan in b033fe08da505774b1bbe0958729ab4d156ac514
  • chore: make dropzone full screen by @phanan in db2c73e02923ccf1e77a587ad7f4c4c2f06f6497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.9.0...v7.10.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.10.0...v7.10.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.2
entry.content:
